short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Schedule Posts Across Multiple Social Media accounts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SocialPilot lets you create schedules for postings on your social media profiles, pages and groups on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter to increase engagement and make your presence felt. It creates a whole new way of connecting to millions of users across the globe. It helps marketers to recognize and build trusted connections. It has following feature

1) Helps to connect unlimited accounts: It allows you to connect your all facebook, twitter and linkedin accounts including facebook pages and linkedin pages.

2) Helps to schedule posts: You can easily schedule your post to be shared at anytime for Facebook, twitter and linkedin.

3) Easily create posts: With very easy to use UI, you can create your post to share on social media accounts.

4) Managing groups: SocialPilot has specially designed the feature to categorized all connected accounts by group

5) Feeds Automation: With SocialPilot, you can easily share new posts and contents  from famous websites on your social media profile.

SocialPilot is a meticulously crafted tool that saves marketers money, time and efforts
